::Firaxis::
       He glares a moment longer.  "That is a... valid reason.  However, once 
they are gone I shall follow through on my threats."  He turns his back and 
begins following the retreating Predacon troops to their base.

--part1_f6.246056bb.2b086ea2_boundary
